title: 100 years: the Australian story (A)
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Sue Spencer and Deborah Masters
brief_description: A documentary of Australia, one of the world’s oldest democracies, this extensive and thorough series traces Australian political history. Themes of empire, independence, multiculturalism and indigenous Australia make up this enlightening series. Politicians, activists, experts and everyday Australians contributed to this powerful, educational documentary.
